articles.description: How does Keegan Murray fit in Sacramento and what can he bring the Kings?
articles.content: Well, its finally over. No more late nights stressing about if the Sacramento Kingstrade their pick, or who they will select if they keep it. They kept it, and used it to select forward Keegan Murray… [+2555 chars]

articles.author: Marcus Dean
articles.title: This Day in History: 50th anniversary of the passing of Title IX - WCVB Boston
articles.description: Today marks 50 years since Title IX was passed into American law. Learn about the history of the bill.
articles.content:
Former U.S. President Richard Nixon signed Title IX into law on June 23, 1972. 
The bill is commonly associated with athletics, but the law is much broader. It prohibits sex discrimination in all un… [+524 chars]
